snippet: Days before a ruling that could drastically undermine the Affordable Care Act, President Obama delivered a speech extolling its benefits.
abstract: Pres Obama delivers speech to Catholic Health Assn in which he mounts political case in support of Affordable Care Act and debunks Republican opposition to it; comes as Supreme Court decides whether to invalidate federal subsidies contained in law.

byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

lead_paragraph: Days before a ruling that could drastically undermine the Affordable Care Act, President Obama delivered a speech extolling its benefits.

headline.main: Before Supreme Court Weighs in, Obama Makes His Case for Health Law
headline.print_headline: Before Supreme Court Weighs In, Obama Makes His Case for Health Law

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
